pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import Articles from 'Factiva' Using the 'tm' Text Mining Framework // Provides a 'tm' Source to create corpora from articles exported from the Dow Jones 'Factiva' content provider as XML or HTML files. It is able to read both text content and meta-data information (including source, date, title, author, subject, geographical coverage, company, industry, and various provider-specific fields).
